text:
[Verse]
Woke up with a beat
In my head it's flowin'
On this heartbeat highway
Life just keeps on goin'

[Verse 2]
Sky so blue and bright
Road ahead so clear
Feel the sun on my face
Happiness is near

[Chorus]
Heartbeat highway runnin'
Heart's a drum that's drummin'
Feel the rhythm breakin'
In the light we're shakin'

[Verse 3]
No map just the breeze
Takin' us away
Every single moment
Is a brand new day

[Bridge]
Through the towns and cities
Every place we've gone
On this heartbeat highway
Feels like home sweet home

[Chorus]
Heartbeat highway runnin'
Heart's a drum that's drummin'
Feel the rhythm breakin'
In the light we're shakin'
title: Heartbeat Highway
